content:

inventory=[{"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 22}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 32}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 39, "index": 38}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 28, "index": 42}, {"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "blue_concrete", "quantity": 21, "index": 44}]

thought: I want to craft warped stairs. Warped stairs require 3 warped planks in a stair-like pattern in the crafting grid. I have 6 warped planks in my inventory, so I will start by moving one from slot 22 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
